DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"colCount":"1","labelLocation":"top","items":[{"editorType":"dxTextArea","editorOptions":{"value":"Setting the user's password will create a new password for the user automatically, and at the same time disable the user's login with the old password.
